text: Is there a way to add version numbers to the end of HubSpot stylesheets like you can with WordPress? Something like {{ require_css(get_asset_url(‘../../dist/css/style.css?ver_123’)) }}

One of our developers using a PC is having with using hs upload of our directory, wondering if anyone knows what this could be:
```A RequestError has occurred. Error: unable to get local issuer certificate```
not sure if this issue in particular is Windows-specific, but as someone that's done HS dev on both OS's, I'd strongly suggest using WSL if they must be on PC.
so is that like a virtual machine inside of a Windows machine for his setup?
similar, it installs a linux distro on top of windows (I use Ubuntu) and lets you use that as your terminal instead of powershell.
